reviews.review: Great follow up to hl2. Admittedly not as good but a very good story
Una excelente secuela la verdad, no habia jugado nunca esta historia, aunque los dialogos en espaol parecen muy roboticos
Sometimes, you just can't beat the classics. This game came out in 2004, and yet it is still one of the best looking games ever.
honestly liked it better than episode 2
Half Life 2 Episode One e uma expans√£o daora que a VALVe fez com musicas e enredo muito daora
Incredible story to an incredible game series!
Probably the most exciting of the episodes, I wrote a review about Half-Life 2 which is basically how I felt about all of the episodes. Fantastic none the less.

I love the Half-Life franchise, rich story, characters, and just enough exploits to keep me coming back. However, I did find Episode One to be the most tedious game in the franchise. You spend much of the game indoors/in the dark, and finding your way can be an issue. Still a strong installment in this legendary franchise.
Zombines? I got a better joke, what do you get when the Combine go to school?
More killing combine in the Citadel and then an escape from city 17. Pretty short but good.
i like this game so much i think episode 1 is my favorite

Short continuation to the main game that came out in 2004.While it's not as good as the main game it still offers solid gameplay with lots of action Only thing I'll say as a negative trait is that the game is really short.

This is the one where you have to carry that gnome around yeah?
Dude I literally could've made this entire thing easier for me if I didn't take the gnome with me into the spider caverns.
–ü–æ –º–æ–µ–º—É Half Life 2 –∏ Half Life 2: Episode Two –±—É–¥—É—Ç –ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–µ–µ —á–µ–º —ç—Ç–æ—Ç
El peor episodio de la saga, Si jugaste Half-life 2 este te lo pasas en una hora y poco.Sumamente innecesario y aburrido.

This is a short and fun continuation of the events after the Half Life 2 Ending. If you care at all about the Story of Half Life or just want more Half Life to play, then definitely buy Episode 1 & 2. Even if you just want a fun shooter to play, Episodes 1 & 2 are under a dollar each on sale!
Much better than the base game if I say so. Gameplay was more fun overall, pretty much the same amount of story in a fraction of the time. I'm fairly happy with this episode.
While it starts abit weak it gets better overtime and ends with an amazing final fight.

Still cant excel half life 2.

8/10 not too long but good gameplay.

De tout les √©pisodes de la saga Half life, celui-ci est le plus nul, le plus stupide, le plus d√©bile, le plus frustrant, le plus cr√©tin jamais produit. Le plus court aussi, mais au final, c'est une qualit√©, car votre calvaire ne durera pas longtemps.

L'√©pisode z√©ro se caract√©risait pas sa narration, son ambiance, ses environnements vari√©s. Ici on glisse de pi√®ge en embuscade au travers de couloirs tordus, accompagn√© par des PNJ invincibles, √† l'IA d√©faillante, qui vont vous g√™ner dans vos mouvements, et vous cirer les pompes.

Bref √©pisode sans int√©r√™t. M√™me pas en solde, m√™me pas gratuit.

It's basically Gordon and Alyx Road Trip Edition and for this I don't really like it nearly as much as any other Half Life games, aside from Blueshift of course. I always found  Alyx to be an annoying mary sue-esque little shit who only existed to compliment the player, and to have to listen to her monologues in place of all the other entertaining characters for almost the entire game was a pain. Still, Half Life is Half Life and this game still works as a Half Life Game. I especially enjoyed the hospital level at the end, and it had some great set pieces and puzzles.

Not much to say really. One of the best games ever made. 10/10
wow not as good as the first one or the 2nd one
